snippet.title: Void Bastards Announcement
snippet.description:
Inspired by BioShock and System Shock 2, Void Bastards is a revolutionary new strategy-shooter that will test your wits as well as exercise your aim. Can you lead the misfit prisoners of the Void Ark through the derelict spaceships and myriad dangers of the Sargasso Nebula? Will you make the right choices about what to do, where to go and when to fight? Master combat, manage ship controls, scavenge supplies, craft improvised tools and much more!

Coming in 2019 - wishlist the game now at https://store.steampowered.com/app/857980/Void_Bastards/.

Get more information at http://www.voidbastards.com.
